title: Landing Page Load and Responsiveness
description: Verify the landing page loads correctly and is fully responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page on desktop viewport.
Confirm all assets load properly and UI elements are displayed as designed.
Resize browser to tablet viewport.
Verify the UI adjusts correctly without layout breaks or overlapping elements.
Resize browser to mobile viewport.
Confirm the landing page maintains usability and design integrity, including the visibility and functionality of CTA buttons.

title: LoginDialog Authentication Success
description: Check that the LoginDialog opens when login button is clicked and successfully authenticates user with Supabase backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page and click the login button.
Verify that the LoginDialog modal opens.
Enter valid user credentials.
Submit the login form.
Confirm authentication succeeds and user session is established.
Verify Redux store updates with loginSuccess action and user's profile data is loaded.

title: LoginDialog Authentication Failure and Error Handling
description: Verify the system's behavior when an incorrect username or password is entered during login.

steps.description: Open LoginDialog via login button.
Input invalid username and/or password.
Submit the login form.
Check that login fails and appropriate error message is displayed.
Ensure Redux store does not update loginSuccess state.

title: Session Persistence After Reload
description: Ensure that user sessions persist after page reload using Supabase session management APIs.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Reload the application page.
Verify the session is restored without requiring login again.
Check Redux store accurately reflects the persisted authentication state.

title: Navigation and Route Protection
description: Test that navigation routes update correctly with browser history and protect admin-only routes based on authentication state.

steps.description: Login as a non-admin user.
Attempt to navigate to an admin-only route.
Verify access is denied or redirected appropriately.
Navigate between main app tabs and verify URL syncs with tab state.
Confirm browser back and forward buttons navigate app tabs correctly.

title: Strategy Builder Save and Load Strategies
description: Validate that strategies created or modified in Strategy Builder are saved correctly to localStorage and reloaded accurately in the application state.

steps.description: Open Strategy Builder and create a new strategy.
Save the strategy.
Check that the strategy is correctly stored in localStorage.
Refresh the app and open Strategy Builder again.
Verify the previously saved strategy is loaded and editable.
Attempt to load corrupted or invalid data from localStorage.
Ensure the app handles the error gracefully without crash and prompts user appropriately.

title: Backtesting Process and Results Display
description: Ensure backtesting runs correctly on selected strategies and results are clearly displayed with history accessible.

steps.description: Select a saved strategy and initiate backtest run.
Verify backtest completes without error.
Confirm results are displayed in BacktestResults UI component with correct metrics and visuals.
Access backtest result history.
Check past backtest results are listed correctly with option to re-review.
Simulate failure in backtest process (e.g., invalid input or network error).
Validate error message is shown to user and system recovers gracefully.

title: Realtime Signal Monitor Updates
description: Verify the Realtime Signal Monitor component receives and updates live trading signals reliably and without delay.

steps.description: Navigate to the Signal Monitor page.
Confirm the component subscribes to live trading signal feed.
Validate signals are updated in real-time on the UI without noticeable lag.
Simulate interruption of the live feed.
Check if the component handles feed loss gracefully, shows an error or reconnect message.
Restore live feed.
Ensure signals resume updating correctly.

title: Auto Trading Panels Functional Verification
description: Test Auto Trading panels for order placement, portfolio monitoring, and automation controls with real-time updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Auto Trading panel.
Verify current portfolio data displays accurately.
Place a new order via OrderPanel.
Confirm order submission succeeds and reflects in the portfolio.
Toggle automated trading feature on/off.
Ensure system responds correctly to automation control.
Simulate failed order submission due to network or validation error.
Check error is displayed and user can retry.

title: Market Overview Dashboard Data and Responsiveness
description: Validate Market Overview dashboard displays current market status with accurate data and is responsive across device types.

steps.description: Open Market Overview dashboard.
Confirm all market data components load and update correctly.
Resize viewport across device sizes.
Verify dashboard maintains usability and layout consistency.

title: Investment Settings Save and Apply
description: Ensure investment parameters configured by the user are saved and properly applied to affect trading strategies as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to Investment Settings page.
Modify investment parameters such as risk tolerance and trade frequency.
Save changes.
Verify changes persist after page reload.
Confirm that updated settings influence strategy execution behavior during trading or backtesting.

title: Performance Dashboard Metrics Accuracy
description: Verify trading performance metrics update correctly based on recent trading activity and portfolio changes.

steps.description: Execute trades or simulate trades in Auto Trading panels.
Navigate to Performance Dashboard.
Check that metrics such as profit/loss, ROI, and win rate update accurately.
Verify charts and visualizations reflect the updated trading data correctly.

title: Network Error Handling for API Calls
description: Simulate and verify that network or API errors during Supabase calls or other API interactions are handled gracefully with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate network timeout or server error during login or data fetch operations.
Verify error message is displayed to user without crashing the app.
Ensure the app provides retry options or fallback states.

title: Avoidance of Unnecessary Re-renders
description: Verify that landing page and components prevent unnecessary re-renders to maintain performance standards.

steps.description: Load landing page and measure component render counts.
Interact with UI elements that do not affect landing page state.
Confirm components do not re-render unnecessarily.
Monitor memory and CPU usage during typical user flows.
Check for performance degradation or memory leaks.
